articles.title: Malan and Shamsi blitz Sri Lanka - SuperSport
articles.description: A magnificent century from Janneman Malan helped South Africa level the three-match one-day international series against Sri Lanka with a commanding 67-run Duckworth-Lewis-Stern victory.

articles.title: South Africa banning 50ppm diesel - MyBroadband
articles.description: The government has published regulations that will ban the sale of diesel grades with more than 10 parts per million (10ppm) in two years’ time.
articles.content:
